content: This development averaged just shy of 10,000 foot lateral lengths, the IP30s for the package were approximately 3000 BOE per day which is 84% oil or 2500 barrels of oil per day per well. You can see that during the quarter, we increased oil production volumes by 12% delivering almost $300 million of EBITDAX, generated record free cash flow of approximately $137 million, reduced total net debt by a $150 million and lowered our leverage to 0.7 times.
